text.section: April 24 of each year is declared to be "Kentucky Writers' Day."

The Tourism, Arts and Heritage Cabinet may plan and direct a yearly event on April 24 honoring Kentucky writers. These plans may include designing programs for schools and civic or business organizations.

law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 37, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 61, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 1994 Ky.
